title: Change In Lifestyle: Forecasting Consumer Behaviour In MENA & Saudi For 2021
description: The world has evolved at a rapid pace with major improvements in living standards, driven most notably by technological advancements, globalization and economic reforms.

title: Technology Adoption In Wealth Management
description: Even as technology spending worldwide is increasing rapidly, wealth management firms have been slow to adopt technology, despite unmistakable trends across all other industries.
